Welcome To SK BDF Farms

About Us

SK BDF Farms is one of the leading farmlands in Ghana,dealing in with Snail Farming, Cat-Fish Rearing and Vegetables.Eskay farms was started in 2017 by Adu Angel Benjamin.

As a farming hub we aim to provide nothing but the best food Products for our consumers.

We also aim to provide essential food products by exceeding our customers expectations through value added and integrated information services.
